questions:
What is the main focus of the photo?
A) A bustling city street
B) A scenic beach
C) Plants growing between stone steps
D) A family gathering

What is in the foreground of the photo?
A) A sandy beach
B) Stone steps with vegetation
C) A busy street
D) A flowing river

What is in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A person walking
C) Grass and small plants
D) A car

What can be seen in the background of the photo?
A) Tall buildings
B) More stone steps with vegetation
C) A large body of water
D) A playground

What type of surface is shown in the photo?
A) Wooden planks
B) Sand
C) Stone steps
D) Metal grates

What is the condition of the stone steps?
A) Newly constructed
B) Covered in snow
C) Weathered with some moss and plants
D) Painted in bright colors

What kind of plants are growing between the steps?
A) Tall trees
B) Grass and small leafy plants
C) Flowering bushes
D) Cacti

What is the texture of the stone steps?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and weathered
C) Covered in graffiti
D) Shiny and metallic

What is the primary color in the photo?
A) Red
B) Blue
C) Green and grey
D) Yellow

What is the angle of the photo?
A) Aerial view
B) Eye level
C) Close-up
D) Wide-angle

What is the photo mainly about?
A) Urban architecture
B) Natural growth in a man-made environment
C) Wildlife
D) Human activity

What is the relationship between the stone steps and the plants?
A) The steps are being overtaken by the plants
B) The plants are being removed from the steps
C) The steps are brand new with no plants
D) The plants are artificial decorations

What is the state of the stone steps?
A) Newly built and pristine
B) Old and weathered
C) Recently painted
D) Covered in litter

What is the primary focus of the foreground?
A) A large tree
B) A flowing river
C) Stone steps with grass and plants
D) A busy street

What kind of vegetation is present?
A) Large trees
B) Small shrubs and grass
C) Flowering plants
D) Desert cacti

What is the texture of the stones?
A) Smooth and shiny
B) Rough and weathered
C) Soft and sandy
D) Metallic and cold

What is not visible in the photo?
A) People
B) Plants
C) Stones
D) Sunlight

What is the main contrast in the photo?
A) Between the bright sky and dark ground
B) Between the green plants and grey stones
C) Between the large trees and small shrubs
D) Between the people and the environment

What is the primary element in the center of the photo?
A) A large tree
B) A person
C) Grass and small leafy plants
D) A building

What is the condition of the ground surface?
A) Smooth and clean
B) Rough and cracked
C) Covered in water
D) Filled with litter

What kind of setting is depicted in the photo?
A) Indoor
B) Outdoor
C) Underwater
D) Space

What is the relationship between the plants and the stones?
A) The stones are being overtaken by the plants
B) The plants are being removed from the stones
C) The stones are brand new with no plants
D) The plants are artificial

What is the primary texture in the photo?
A) Smooth and polished
B) Rough and natural
C) Soft and fluffy
D) Metallic and cold

What is the primary focus of the background?
A) A large body of water
B) More stone steps with vegetation
C) A busy street
D) A building

What is the main color palette of the photo?
A) Warm tones
B) Cool tones
C) Earthy tones
D) Bright and vibrant colors

What kind of plants are in the photo?
A) Flowering plants
B) Grass and small leafy plants
C) Large trees
D) Desert succulents

What is mainly focused on in the photo?
A) A person
B) An animal
C) Plants
D) Buildings
